Your personal belongings should be stored in special lockers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Useful contacts\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Concluding the acquaintance with the office, we suggest you have a look at brief list of useful contacts:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAOfficeManagementKZ@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Office Management KZ\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" — contact office management service for all questions regarding office and maintenance supplies\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:wfapersonnelkz@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Personnel KZ\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" — personnel management service handles personnel matters: vacation notices, copies of work record books, issuing reference documents from the place of work upon inquiry. For document processing questions, you can contact the office manager. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAPayrollKZ@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Payroll KZ\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" — all questions concerning wages, including changes in wages, vacation pay, amounts to be paid, and others.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAccountingKZ@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Accounting KZ\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" — questions related to accounting, other than those related to wages, such as, but not limited to, requests for power of attorney, payment orders, invoices, advance reports, travel and other matters, should be sent to the mailing address of the accounting Department, not personally \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you have any questions on this section, please address them to your Resource Manager or HR Support. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
